channel.title: Pic Request Forums
channel.description:
ok, post your want/need i can make sigs, or banners at the moment, please Post using these guidelines:
Type: (i.e. banner, sig) Size: (i.e. 600*500) Color(s): (i.e. Blue, green, white) Pic(s): (POST pics or url's) Style: (i.e. Grunge, Soft) Text: (i.e. what u want it to say) Font: (i.e. Arial (if you want a special font, but it is not default, please post url to dl) also post size if you want/need)
If you really need or want a website design, pm, email or msn me, as there will probably be a cost involved.

item.title: Pic Request Forums
item.dc:creator: @John2.0 John2.0
item.description:
@John2.0 wrote:

Type: sig
Size: Big enough for a siggy
Color(s): Blue and red and black
Style: soft, yet compelling
Text: The Anti-Mage
Font: arial would be fine(preferabbly in neon green or blue)

Read full topic
